title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The issue is that there is excessive flashing in the Control Example.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically only, it is observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The expected behavior is that there should not be any excessive flashing when resizing the window in the vertical direction.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the Control Example. 
2. Resize the window vertically only. 
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
